name: PuddleQuest
description:
A top-down action platformer with a "puzzle-strategy" flavor: you can fly in any direction as far as you wish, ...but only in straight line!

Use platforms or bounce on walls to catch 8 Pollens and restore the Lotus Flower.

Info:

  • languages: english / french (informations en français ici)
  • total duration: 1h+ (depending on skill/practice)
  • 24 levels + Boss level

Controls:

The game uses only 4 directions keys:

  • press and hold an arrow key to jump, release it to fall
  • simultaneously press/release another key to tilt laterally while you jump.

Extras:

  • 6 secret levels
  • Printable "PuddleQuest diploma"  (if you finish the Boss)
  • Full screen mode
  • Customizable controls

Pricing / Support us:

The game is FREE (after click on Download button, choose "No thanks, just take me to the downloads").  But you can support/help us to create more games by:

  • a donation of  2$ or more (click Download + choose amount) 
  • sharing on social networks (like Twitter or Facebook )

Thanks!
